subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Often flashing his gap-toothed grin, Michael Strahan explained Tuesday, “I’m trying not to be stupid,” when describing why he was retiring from the N.F.L. after 15 years.
snippet: Often flashing his gap-toothed grin, Michael Strahan explained Tuesday, “I’m trying not to be stupid,” when describing why he was retiring from the N.F.L. after 15 years.
